name: Junkfood 2: Summertime Slotter
summary: Junkfood 2 is a Boom compatible Speedmapping Community Project held in Meowgi's Pacifist Paradise Discord Server which features 83 newly designed slaughter levels; This time, with a summertime theme! The basic premise was to make "Junk Food" slaughter (BFG spammy, high monster count maps) where not a lot of time is spent deliberating about layout/detailing/fight design and other things that can bog a mapper down. It's just good BFG fun.
